main.name: Tom Officer
main.description: Full Stack Developer and Founding Software Engineer of
main.description2: I specialize in building modern, scalable web applications using
main.description3: JavaScript, React, HTML, CSS, PostgreSQL and Node.js
main.bio: Full Stack Developer with two years experience developing and deploying modern, highly scalable, production-level web applications. Prefers working on a tight-knit team in a fast paced Agile SCRUM environment and holds frequent, precise team communication in high regard. Stellar attention to detail with a diverse background in modern technologies. In my free time I'm either spending time with my two year old son, out hiking with my dogs or tracking music in my home recording studio.
main.contactmessage: I'm always open to new opportunities and would love to hear from you. Let's connect!

employment.description: Developed a full stack web application to host video demos for Saas companies. Built out a visually appealing front end by translating UI/UX wireframes into JSX code while fetching, manipulating and displaying data from a RESTful API. Helped develop functional databases and servers to support scalability on the back-end.

Spearheaded custom website from wirefram design to production-level deployment hosted on Vercel. Applied industry best practices to code out a modern, responsive front-end architecture using JavaScript, HTML and CSS.

education.description: Learned industry standards and best practices in both front and back end technology. Practiced modern Agile SCRUM development using JavaScript, React, Express and Node.js. Developed and deployed numerous production-level full stack web applications.

education.degree: Bachelor Of Applied Science, Audio Engineering
education.description: Learned industry standards in professional studio recording, live sound and post-production. Perfected modern recording techniques, production skills, sound design, acoustics, midi systems, mixing, mastering and digital editing.

experience.description: Developed a scalable affiliate marketing website for children's toys using React, Chakra UI, HTML and CSS. Tested, debugged and deployed 10,000+ lines of code and optimized for SEO and accessibility.

Coded out a modern, responsive frontend for a programming blog using JavaScript, React, HTML and CSS. Wrote engaging content and implemented fetch calls to the Contentful API to retrieve, manipulate and display data from the backend.

certificates.title: Advanced JavaScript
certificates.description: Deep dive into JS fundamentals using asynchronous, Object Oriented Programming.

certificates.title: React Front To Back
certificates.description: Learned modern React 16.8+ including hooks, context API, full stack MERN and Redux.

certificates.title: React + Shopify (Headless CMS)
certificates.description: Built a headless Shopify storefront using the Shopify API, React hooks and context API.

certificates.title: Advanced Shopify Theme Development
certificates.description: Learned to build Shopify themes from scratch using Liquid, JavaScript and Vue.js.
